name: Jump and Bunny
description: Most kids now adays grew up playing games like Mario and Sonic. So most people are already familiar with the 2d platformer genre. Jump and Bunny is such a game, but with some new mechanics . You can play the world in any order you like and you have to finish a level to make progress. You can also collect coins to unlock secet stages and maybe if you collect every coin something will happen.
